name: rdgvalg
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(crdg(c1, c2))), wceq(cfv(crdg(c1, c2), c0), cfv(cmpt(s0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(s0))), cfv(c1, cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cdm(cv(s0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))), cres(crdg(c1, c2), c0))))

stmt.origin: tfr2a(c0, crdg(c1, c2), cmpt(s0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(s0))), cfv(c1, cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cdm(cv(s0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))))
stmt.pretty: tfr2a(c0, rec(c1, c2), (s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ if(s0 = ∅, c2, if(Lim(dom(s0)), ⋃ ran(s0),(c1 `(s0 ` ⋃ dom(s0)))))))
